body: At 2nd level, a swamp druid gains a bonus on Initiative checks and Knowledge (geography), Perception, Stealth, Swim, and Survival checks equal to 1/2 her druid level in swamp terrain, and she cannot be tracked in such an environment. This ability replaces woodland stride.
name: Marshwight
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Swamp Druid/Marshwight
